CHAT.comment: diary for nina 32: nina and her mother have just returned from a two week vacation in wellfleet which is in cape cod mass. they spent a lot of time at the ocean and bay beaches and swimming in a lake. before that nina had spent two months with her father in providence rhode island. nina had been upset by the separation first from her mother and then from her father. she had been having trouble sleeping at night. however , during the past week she has settled down. nina and her mother have been back in california for two days. they live with another family now. they live with nick and miriam and their nineteen month old daughter samantha. nina is playing with some stuffed animals in her room. she picks up a large grey rabbit who is almost as big as she is.

u.a: nina and her mother had seen several rabbits hopping as they drove along a small dirt road in wellfleet .
whispered
nina points to a picture of a frog on the bookcase
nina points to the frog in the picture again
Betta is an eleven year old girl who stayed in Wellfleet with nina and her mother .
mother laughs
mother and nina laugh

nina and her mother start looking at some pictures of nina , Pia , a friend of Nina's mother , Nina's mother , and Frank , Nina's uncle , all of whom are playing at the beach and in the woods in Wellfleet .
mother laughs
Nina lies down on the floor and makes swimming motions

nina picks up something imaginary from the floor

nina points to her mother swimming in the picture
nina is looking at a picture of herself playing with a horseshoe crab the tail of the horse+shoe crab is stuck in the sand .
the horse+shoe crab in the picture is sticking in the sand with his tail
nina looks at a picture of her uncle playing with her
mother points to a large grove of trees in the picture
nina yells and starts running around the room

nina is pointing to a picture of herself swimming in the bay in a small pool formed between two sand banks
nina and her mother had gone to gather oysters at the bay . they had sunk into some deep mud as they looked for them .
nina is looking at another picture of herself swimming in the bay with a sun bonnet on her head .

mother and nina are still looking at pictures of nina and others at the beach .

nina and her mother had gone to their house for supper

nina goes over to the window and sees miriam and Samantha ouside . they are playing with the goats who are jumping around .
one of the goats is jumping up to reach for the leaves on the tree
the goats are usually enclosed in the corral
nina points out the window to three horses in a pasture
the goats and chickens and a duck are kept in the same corral
nina gets excited as she watches the animals through the window
nina gets under the covers of her mother's bed . mother goes over to a basket full of laundry .
nina takes one of her nightgowns out of the basket
mother laughs

Maggie is Nina's daytime baby-sitter . she gave Nina a beautiful white dog made out of yarn as a coming home present .

Nina starts reading "Frogs-Merry" , one of her favorite books , to the animals that she has put to bed . Nina's last sentence is one from the story . the story is all about frogs .

Nina remembers the last sentences from the story
